pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Analysis Toolkit // An analysis toolkit focused on genes. It mainly includes five features (search, convert, analysis, plot, and export). The user just needs to input feature id ('entrez', 'symbol', 'ensembl' or 'uniprot') to retrieve feature information and 'PubMed'https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/ records, to convert id types, to easily handle gene enrichment analysis and publication-level figures, to plot group interaction and export results as sheets in one 'excel' file to easily share and communicate with others.
